cluster_classes.class_description: The Heat Affected Zone (HAZ) is the area of base metal near a weld that has not melted but has undergone changes in microstructure and mechanical properties due to welding heat.

members.entity_description: The portion of the base metal adjacent to a weld with altered microstructure and properties due to welding heat.

args.new_description: The Heat Affected Zone (HAZ) is the region of base metal adjacent to a weld that has not melted but has experienced changes in microstructure and mechanical properties due to the heat of welding.
args.justification: Refined class_group to 'Welded Joint Zones' for broader schema connectivity, and updated class_type_hint for clarity; current class is narrowly scoped but correctly defined.

executed_decisions.new_description: The Heat Affected Zone (HAZ) is the region of base metal adjacent to a weld that has not melted but has experienced changes in microstructure and mechanical properties due to the heat of welding.
executed_decisions.justification: Refined class_group to 'Welded Joint Zones' for broader schema connectivity, and updated class_type_hint for clarity; current class is narrowly scoped but correctly defined.
